statement_text: A fourth farm worker has been infected with bird flu in the growing outbreak linked to dairy cows, health officials reported Wednesday. The Colorado man [fourth farm worker] was being monitored when he developed symptoms because of his work with dairy cows, according to the CDC.

rationale: 'growing outbreak' is a description of scale/trend, not a high-potency verb/metaphor.
